pageProduct.name: Swisse Children's Ultivite Multivitamin 120 Chewable Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultivite Children's Multivitamin is a premium quality, great tasting children's multivitamin, containing 21 vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and herbs to support nutritional levels in the body needs, immune system health and cognitive development.

Swisse Ultivite Children's Multivitamin is a premium quality, great tasting children's multivitamin, containing 21 vitamins, minerals, antioxidants and herbs to support nutritional levels in the body needs, immune system health and cognitive development.

Size: 120 Chewable Tablets

KEY FEATURES

• Ideal for fussy eaters and growing children on the go.

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions.

Ingredients

Betacarotene 0.5 mg; Biotin 30 mcg; Vitamin B1 (thiamine nitrate) 1 mg; Vitamin B2 (riboflavin) 1 mg; Vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate) 1.83 mg; Vitamin B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride) 2 mg; Vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin) 3 mcg; Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) 50 mg; Vitamin D3 (colecalciferol) 0.5 mcg; Vitamin E (d-alpha-tocopheryl acid succinate) 4.95 mg; Nicotinamide 10 mg; Calcium (from calcium citrate tetrahydrate) 21.1 mg; Folic Acid 15 mcg; Iron (from ferrous fumarate) 2.3 mg; Magnesium (from magnesium phosphate pentahydrate) 1.7 mg; Manganese (from manganese sulfate monohydrate) 163 mcg; Zinc (from zinc sulfate monohydrate) 364 mcg; Citrus Bioflavonoids Extract 2 mg; Briar Rose (Rosa canina extract 2.5 mg) equiv. dry fruit 10 mg; Nettle (Urtica dioica extract 2.5 mg) equiv. dry herb 10 mg; Siberian Ginseng (Eleutherococcus senticosus extract 650 mcg) equiv. dry root 6.5 mg.

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 50 mg

VITAMIN D3 20 IU (cholecalciferol 500 ng)

VITAMIN E 6 IU (d-alpha tocopheryl acid succinate 4.95 mg)

VITAMIN B1 (thiamine nitrate) 1 mg

VITAMIN B2 (riboflavin) 1 mg

NICOTINAMIDE 10 mg

VITAMIN B5 (pantothenic acid) 1.83 mg (from calcium pantothenate 2 mg)

VITAMIN B6 (pyridoxine hydrochloride) 2 mg

VITAMIN B12 (cyanocobalamin) 3 mcg

FOLIC ACID 15 mcg

BIOTIN 30 mcg

BETACAROTENE 500 mcg

CALCIUM 21.1 mg (from calcium citrate 100 mg)

MANGANESE 163 mcg (from manganese sulphate monohydrate 500 mcg)

ZINC 364 mcg (from zinc sulfate monohydrate 1 mg)

MAGNESIUM 1.7 mg (from magnesium phosphate 8 mg)

IRON 2.3 mg (from ferrous fumarate 7.36 mg)

CITRUS BIOFLAVONOIDS EXTRACT 2 mg

NETTLE (Urtica dioica) extract equiv. dry herb 10 mg

ROSEHIPS (Rosa canina) extract equiv. dry fruit 10 mg

SIBERIAN GINSENG (Eleutherococcus senticosus) extract equiv. dry root 6.5 mg

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - CHILD DOSAGE:
2-4 years: Chew one tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal.
4-12 years: Chew two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal.
Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Do not swallow whole

2-4 years: Chew one tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal.

4-12 years: Chew two tablets daily, during or immediately after a meal.

Or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
